control_attributes.control_description: The information system conceals, via the session lock, information previously visible on the display with a publicly viewable image.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization ensures that security attributes associated with information are reassigned only via re-grading mechanisms validated using [Assignment: organization-defined techniques or procedures].

Control Statement: The information system conceals, via the session lock, information previously visible on the display with a publicly viewable image.
